name: 弗雷德里克·道格拉斯
bio: 生为奴隶，自学识字，1838年逃出奴隶主控制。成为美国最伟大的废奴主义演说家和作家。他的自传《一个美国奴隶的自述》震撼了整个北方。内战期间为林肯政府出谋划策，推动黑人士兵参军，是美国种族平等运动的先驱。
bio_en: Abolitionist, orator, and statesman who escaped slavery to become the most influential African American of the 19th century. His autobiography became a bestseller exposing the horrors of slavery. He advised President Lincoln on emancipation and recruited Black soldiers for the Union Army. A lifelong advocate for equal rights for all people.

personalEvents.title: 逃出奴役
personalEvents.description: 伪装成自由水手，从巴尔的摩逃往纽约，获得自由
personalEvents.description_en: Disguised as a free sailor, escaped from Baltimore to New York, gaining freedom

personalEvents.title: 出版自传
personalEvents.description: 出版《一个美国奴隶的自述》，轰动全美
personalEvents.description_en: Published 'Narrative of the Life of Frederick Douglass,' creating a sensation across America

personalEvents.title: 创办报纸
personalEvents.description: 在罗切斯特创办《北极星报》，传播废奴思想
personalEvents.description_en: Founded 'The North Star' newspaper in Rochester, spreading abolitionist ideas

personalEvents.title: 推动黑人参军
personalEvents.description: 说服林肯允许黑人参加联邦军队，组建第54马萨诸塞步兵团
personalEvents.description_en: Persuaded Lincoln to allow Black soldiers in the Union Army, forming the 54th Massachusetts Infantry

personalEvents.title: 竞选副总统
personalEvents.description: 成为美国历史上第一位获得副总统提名的非裔美国人
personalEvents.description_en: Became the first African American in U.S. history to receive a vice presidential nomination
